EmailTemplate.name: Feb-2013_Fire-Training.Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Last Chance to Register for the TriTech's Perform (IMC) Fire Training Summit - February 13-14, 2013
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STAY CONNECTED <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> <http://twitter.com/tritechsoftware> <http://www.linkedin.com/companies/tritech-software-systems> <http://www.youtube.com/user/TriTechSoftware> REGISTRATION DEADLINE: FEBRUARY 1, 2013 Seating is limited. Register today!
2013 Fire Training Summit February 13-14, 2013 l Nashua, NH Don't miss your chance to attend training focused on maximizing the use of Perform (formerly known as IMC) in your Fire Department.
Topics will include Permits and Inspections, Equipment, Site File Maintenance, NFIRS, Attendance and Security. Please refer to the registration website for a complete agenda.
We will be breaking this event into two separate days and you have the option of registering for one day or the other, or both if you choose. Pricing will be $125 per day and lunch will be provided. If you are interested in attending please register now <http://offers.tritech.com/Feb2013_FireTraining_TrainingSummit.html>, and an official quote from TriTech will be sent. Your registration will be completed once it is returned to us with the proper signatures.
I hope to see you there!
David Bourbonniere Project Management & Training Supervisor
Questions: Please contact your respective Client Account Manager:
David Bell (774) 239-3722 david.bell@tritech.com <mailto:david.bell@tritech.com>
Mark Baranowski (978) 215-2270 mark.baranowski@tritech.com <mailto:mark.baranowski@tritech.com> Training Details
<http://offers.tritech.com/Feb2013_FireTraining_TrainingSummit.html>
Dates: February 13-14, 2013
Cost Per Person: $125 Per Day (Includes Lunch)
Location: Nashua Fire-Rescue 177 Lake St Nashua, NH 03060
map <https://maps.google.com/maps?oe=utf-8&client=firefox-a&q=177+Lake+St+in+Nashua,%20+NH&ie=UTF-8&hq=&hnear=0x89e3b0cb092b9575:0x5986479a7fd5d6a,177+Lake+St,%20+Nashua,+NH+03060&gl=us&ei=AJPcUPvUBszU0gGgpIH4Ag&ved=0CDUQ8gEwAA>
